com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swing.adapter

Class SwingAdapterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swing.adapter.SwingAdapterFactory

  • public class SwingAdapterFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating Acrolinx Java SDK adapters for swing objects. Use INSTANCE.
